trans-unit.source: Provides data for the <see cref="E:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.ColumnDividerDoubleClick" /> event of a <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView" />.
trans-unit.target: 提供 <see cref="E:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.ColumnDividerDoubleClick" /> 的 <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView" /> 事件的資料。

trans-unit.source: For more information about handling events, see [NIB: Consuming Events](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/01e4f1bc-e55e-413f-98c7-6588493e5f67).
trans-unit.target: 如需處理事件的詳細資訊，請參閱[NIB： 使用事件](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/01e4f1bc-e55e-413f-98c7-6588493e5f67)。

trans-unit.source: The following code example demonstrates the use of this type.
trans-unit.target: 下列程式碼範例示範如何使用這個型別。

trans-unit.source: In the example, an event handler reports on the occurrence of the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.ColumnDividerDoubleClick> event.
trans-unit.target: 在範例中，事件處理常式會報告一次<xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.ColumnDividerDoubleClick>事件。

trans-unit.source: This report helps you to learn when the event occurs and can assist you in debugging.
trans-unit.target: 此報表可協助您了解事件發生的時機，並可協助您偵錯。

trans-unit.source: To report on multiple events or on events that occur frequently, consider replacing <xref:System.Windows.Forms.MessageBox.Show%2A> with <xref:System.Console.WriteLine%2A?displayProperty=nameWithType> or appending the message to a multiline <xref:System.Windows.Forms.TextBox>.
trans-unit.target: 若要報告多個事件或事件經常發生，請考慮更換<xref:System.Windows.Forms.MessageBox.Show%2A>與<xref:System.Console.WriteLine%2A?displayProperty=nameWithType>或將訊息附加到多行<xref:System.Windows.Forms.TextBox>。

trans-unit.source: To run the example code, paste it into a project that contains an instance of type <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView> named `DataGridView1`.
trans-unit.target: 若要執行範例程式碼，將它貼到包含類型的執行個體的專案<xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView>名為`DataGridView1`。

trans-unit.source: Then ensure that the event handler is associated with the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.ColumnDividerDoubleClick> event.
trans-unit.target: 請確定事件處理常式關聯<xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.ColumnDividerDoubleClick>事件。

trans-unit.source: The index of the column next to the column divider that was double-clicked.
trans-unit.target: 在已按兩下之資料行分割線旁邊的資料行索引。

trans-unit.source: A new <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.HandledMouseEventArgs" /> containing the inherited event data.
trans-unit.target: 新的 <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.HandledMouseEventArgs" />，其中包含繼承的事件資料。

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new instance of the <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewColumnDividerDoubleClickEventArgs" /> class.
trans-unit.target: 初始化 <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewColumnDividerDoubleClickEventArgs" /> 類別的新執行個體。

trans-unit.source: This constructor initializes the value of the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewColumnDividerDoubleClickEventArgs.ColumnIndex%2A> property using the `columnIndex` value.
trans-unit.target: 這個建構函式初始化的值<xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewColumnDividerDoubleClickEventArgs.ColumnIndex%2A>屬性使用`columnIndex`值。

trans-unit.source: The values of properties inherited from <xref:System.Windows.Forms.HandledMouseEventArgs> are initialized to the values specified in `e`.
trans-unit.target: 屬性值繼承自<xref:System.Windows.Forms.HandledMouseEventArgs>會初始化為指定的值`e`。

trans-unit.source: <paramref name="columnIndex" /> is less than -1.
trans-unit.target: <paramref name="columnIndex" /> 小於 -1。

trans-unit.source: The index of the column next to the column divider that was double-clicked.
trans-unit.target: 在已按兩下之資料行分割線旁邊的資料行索引。

trans-unit.source: The index of the column next to the divider.
trans-unit.target: 分割線旁邊的資料行索引。

trans-unit.source: This method indicates the column to the left of the double-clicked divider if the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView> has a <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.RightToLeft%2A> property value of <xref:System.Windows.Forms.RightToLeft.No>; otherwise, it indicates the column to the right of the double-clicked divider.
trans-unit.target: 如果這個方法會指出當按兩下分割線的左邊的資料行<xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView>具有<xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.RightToLeft%2A>屬性值為<xref:System.Windows.Forms.RightToLeft.No>; 否則它會指出當按兩下分割線的右邊資料行。

trans-unit.source: The index is the zero-based index of the column in the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.Columns%2A?displayProperty=nameWithType> collection.
trans-unit.target: 索引是以零為起始的索引中的資料行<xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.Columns%2A?displayProperty=nameWithType>集合。

trans-unit.source: The following code example demonstrates the use of this member.
trans-unit.target: 下列程式碼範例示範如何使用這個成員。

trans-unit.source: In the example, an event handler reports on the occurrence of the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.ColumnDividerDoubleClick?displayProperty=nameWithType> event.
trans-unit.target: 在範例中，事件處理常式會報告一次<xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.ColumnDividerDoubleClick?displayProperty=nameWithType>事件。

trans-unit.source: This report helps you to learn when the event occurs and can assist you in debugging.
trans-unit.target: 此報表可協助您了解事件發生的時機，並可協助您偵錯。

trans-unit.source: To report on multiple events or on events that occur frequently, consider replacing <xref:System.Windows.Forms.MessageBox.Show%2A?displayProperty=nameWithType> with <xref:System.Console.WriteLine%2A?displayProperty=nameWithType> or appending the message to a multiline <xref:System.Windows.Forms.TextBox>.
trans-unit.target: 若要報告多個事件或事件經常發生，請考慮更換<xref:System.Windows.Forms.MessageBox.Show%2A?displayProperty=nameWithType>與<xref:System.Console.WriteLine%2A?displayProperty=nameWithType>或將訊息附加到多行<xref:System.Windows.Forms.TextBox>。

trans-unit.source: To run the example code, paste it into a project that contains an instance of type <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView> named `DataGridView1`.
trans-unit.target: 若要執行範例程式碼，將它貼到包含類型的執行個體的專案<xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView>名為`DataGridView1`。

trans-unit.source: Then ensure that the event handler is associated with the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.ColumnDividerDoubleClick?displayProperty=nameWithType> event.
trans-unit.target: 請確定事件處理常式關聯<xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.ColumnDividerDoubleClick?displayProperty=nameWithType>事件。
